common.upload_warning: Uploading Image to Cloud, please dont close the window...

retrospective: wReflect is a website that helps you reflect on the successes and challenges of your work.
It helps you identify what went well and what can be improved, enabling self-assessment for both you and your team.
why: Realizing the difficulty of self-reflection through writing, asking, and answering questions,
wReflect was born to make this process easier and interactive with team members.

evaluate.1: Help team members interact and track work progress more easily.
evaluate.2: This tool helps reflect on strengths and weaknesses through self-assessment and team evaluations.
evaluate.3: Track current tasks and planned activities to ensure completion.
evaluate.4: Monitor the health of team collaboration and identify areas for improvement.

columns.title: Board Title
columns.public_desc: Anyone with the link can access this board

intro: You're now looking back at what your team did well or poorly over the past year.
Use this section to review team progress with customizable options.
group: Filter similar opinions to combine them into a consensus.
Drag and drop opinions to group them together.
votes: Vote for the ideas that are team priorities or help the team grow.
Each member has a voting limit set by the team leader.
discuss: Discuss the opinions of team members to reach consensus.
Add comments or actions to drive better team communication.

create.title: Create Assessment
create.placeholder: Please input the name of the assessment
create.message: Please select criteria or delete this field

action_tracker.title: Action Tracker
action_tracker.description: Create new action items & keep track of all actions in your teams.
